channel.title: Comments on: Single Command to Download and Install All Bangla Fonts in Your Linux

item.title: By: Fahad Ahammed
item.dc:creator: Fahad Ahammed
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/single-command-to-download-and-install-all-bangla-fonts-in-your-linux/#comment-4597">rsdk</a>.
Thanks for the feedback. I will try to give an update for whonix.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to rsdk.

Thanks for the feedback. I will try to give an update for whonix.

item.title: By: rsdk
item.dc:creator: rsdk
item.description: Salam, thanks brother for your wolderful script. I used this in many linux distros so far, but stuck up with whonix, a debian 10x based privacy oriented distro. .. would you plaese give it a try and make a solution for us !
item.content:encoded: Salam, thanks brother for your wolderful script. I used this in many linux distros so far, but stuck up with whonix, a debian 10x based privacy oriented distro. .. would you plaese give it a try and make a solution for us !

item.title: By: Fahad Ahammed
item.dc:creator: Fahad Ahammed
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/single-command-to-download-and-install-all-bangla-fonts-in-your-linux/#comment-4594">sarwarjahan1</a>.
It is my pleasure.

item.title: By: sarwarjahan1
item.dc:creator: sarwarjahan1
item.description: Great tool. I used to install Bangla fonts by searching the word “bangla” or “bengali” in the repo (both ubuntu and arch). With this tool, it has become very easy to install Bangla fonts. Thank you so much.
item.content:encoded: Great tool. I used to install Bangla fonts by searching the word “bangla” or “bengali” in the repo (both ubuntu and arch). With this tool, it has become very easy to install Bangla fonts. Thank you so much.
